mapper.select:
select f.id, f.file_name, f.file_type, f.file_size, f.file_path, f.file_ext, f.md5, f.uploader_id, f.download_count, f.download_expire_time, f.status, f.create_time, u.nickname as uploader_name from im_file_asset f left join im_user u on f.uploader_id = u.id
f.status = 'ACTIVE' and f.file_name like concat('%', #{fileName}, '%') and f.file_type = #{fileType} and f.uploader_id = #{uploaderId} and date_format(f.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(f.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by f.create_time desc

select f.id, f.file_name, f.file_type, f.file_size, f.file_path, f.file_ext, f.md5, f.uploader_id, f.download_count, f.download_expire_time, f.status, f.create_time, u.nickname as uploader_name from im_file_asset f left join im_user u on f.uploader_id = u.id where f.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into im_file_asset ( file_name, file_type, file_size, file_ext, file_path, md5, uploader_id, download_count, download_expire_time, status, create_time ) values ( #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{fileExtension}, #{filePath}, #{md5}, #{uploaderId}, #{downloadCount}, #{downloadExpireTime}, #{status}, NOW() )
mapper.update: update im_file_asset set status = 'DELETED' where id = #{id}

update im_file_asset set status = 'DELETED' where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from im_file_asset where status = 'ACTIVE' and uploader_id = #{uploaderId}
select IFNULL(sum(file_size), 0) from im_file_asset where status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.update: update im_file_asset set status = 'DELETED' where file_path is null or file_path = ''
mapper.select: select IFNULL(count(*), 0) as totalCount, IFNULL(count(case when file_type = 'image' then 1 end), 0) as imageCount, IFNULL(count(case when file_type = 'video' then 1 end), 0) as videoCount, IFNULL(count(case when file_type = 'document' then 1 end), 0) as docCount, IFNULL(count(case when file_type = 'audio' then 1 end), 0) as audioCount, IFNULL(count(case when file_type = 'other' then 1 end), 0) as otherCount, IFNULL(sum(file_size), 0) as totalStorage, IFNULL(count(case when date(create_time) = curdate() then 1 end), 0) as todayUploads from im_file_asset where status = 'ACTIVE'
mapper.update: update im_file_asset set download_count = IFNULL(download_count, 0) + 1 where id = #{id} and status = 'ACTIVE'
